meta_description: Explore the history and archaeology of Sedona and Verde Valley at our museum with exhibits, events, and educational resources.
hours_text:
## Plan Your Visit

#### Hours

**Regular Hours - Tuesdays thru Saturdays  
** Opens at 10:00 am  
Last admission at 3:00 pm - Closes at 4:00 pm

Check website before your visit as the Museum is occasionally closed for special events. Closed Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, the day before Thanksgiving, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve and Day, New Year's Eve and Day.

#### Admission

$10 - Adults: 18-64  
$5 - Seniors (65+)

Free - VVAC and NARM Members  
Free - Under 18 and students with ID  
Free - Native Americans  
Free - Blue Star Museum Program

#### Directions

We at the eastern end (past Bashas’) of the Verde Village Shopping Complex at:  
460 W. Finnie Flat Road  
Camp Verde, AZ 86322

[ ](https://maps.app.goo.gl/sTgqUSazLprkFjwX9)

collections_text: #### Explore the archaeology of Sedona and the Verde Valley through our museum, where history, art, and science come to life. Embark on a journey that educates, inspires, and enriches your understanding of the diverse cultures of Sedona and the Verde Valley.
